MANUAL: apt-package-util (2.4.0)

Contents

  • Introduction.
  • Quick Start
  • Options

Introduction

apt-package-util is an application which creates folders for use in Axiom Analysis Suite from the TXT or CHP output of APT or GTC.

Quick Start

The simplest way to use apt-package-util is to point it at the text output folder from a genotyping analysis. Here is an example command line:

  apt-package-util.exe \
    --log-file <desired log file location>  \
    --batch-folder <desired output location for the AAS folder> \
    --genotype-data-dir <path to genotyping data folder>

If the various output files from a genotyping analysis are not in the same location then optional parameters may be used to specify their location:

  apt-package-util.exe \
    --log-file <desired log file location>  \
    --batch-folder <desired output location for the AAS folder> \
    --genotype-data-dir <path to genotyping data folder> \
    --report-txt-file < Full path to AxiomGT1.report.txt if file name/path is different from genotype-dir> \
    --snp-posteriors-file <Full path to AxiomGT1.snp-posteriors.txt if file name/path is different from genotype-dir>

Options: 

   'apt-package-util'
   2.4.0 svn://svn.affymetrix.com/apt2-genotyping/branches/APT_GT_2_4_0_BRANCH@885(1494) 2015-08-14-06:11


Usage:

  apt-package-util --genotype-data-dir <folder> --batch-folder <folder> [options]


USER HELP ----------

  --version (flag) = Display the version info for this program.

  --user-help (flag) = Display help intended for end-users.
    Aliases: --help, -h

  --log-file (string8) = The name of the log file.  Defaults to 'PROGRAMNAME-NUMBER.log'.
    Aliases: --lf

  --console-add-select (string8) = Add selectors for console messages.
    e.g. to include all debug messages: --console-add-select debug
         to include all messages of level 3 or higher: --console-add-select '*:3'


  --console-add-neg-select (string8) = Add selectors to be excluded from console messages.
    e.g. to exclude all warning messages and errors summary: --console-add-neg-select WARNING,summary


  --arg-file (filename) = Read arguments from this file.
    File should be a valid XML file, and should contain elements of the form
    <Parameter name="PARAMETER-NAME" analysis="NODE-NAME" currentValue="VALUE" />.

  --check-param (flag) = Stop the program after the command parameters have been checked.

  --genotype-data-dir (dirname,required) = Full path of genotype output folder (APT or GTC) containing genotyped data such as Calvin CHP files.

  --report-txt-file (filename) = Full path to AxiomGT1.report.txt if file name/path is different from genotype-data-dir.

  --snp-posteriors-file (filename) = Full path to AxiomGT1.snp-posteriors.txt if file name/path is different from genotype-data-dir.

  --geno-qc-res-file (filename) = Full path to Geno-qcResults.txt if file name/path is different from genotype-data-dir.
    default value: 'Geno-qcResults.txt'

  --performance-file (filename) = Full path to Ps.performance.txt if file name/path is different from genotype-data-dir.
    default value: 'Ps.performance.txt'

  --samples-per-chunk (int32) = Number of samples to be processed per chunk due to memory limitation. Default is 200
    default value: '200'

  --batch-folder (dirname,required) = Full path for Axiom Analysis Suite folder.

  --@help       = print developer help
